books.author: by Kathryn Stockett
books.description: A young white woman and two black maids in 1960s Mississippi.
books.name: THE HELP

books.author: by James Patterson and Marshall Karp
books.description: When a young man finds a bag of diamonds, he gets the attention of the Ghost, a major assassin, and a rival assassin who wants the Ghost gone forever.
books.name: KILL ME IF YOU CAN

books.author: by Darcie Chan
books.description: Only one man knows an abused widow, which revealed will change many lives in her small Vermont town.
books.name: THE MILL RIVER RECLUSE

books.author: by CJ Lyons
books.description: A woman finds no closure after a man is executed for the murder of her husband and son.
books.name: BLIND FAITH

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: Unsuspecting drivers wind up dead after pulling into a boarded-up rest stop on a Maine highway.
books.name: MILE 81

books.author: by Debbie Macomber
books.description: Bruce Peyton’s pregnant wife has left him, and he’s not the only one in town with problems; the 11th book of the Cedar Cove series.
books.name: 1105 YAKIMA STREET

books.author: by Chris Culver
books.description: Against orders, a former homicide detective begins an investigation into his niece
books.name: THE ABBEY

books.author: by Christine Feehan
books.description: A master executioner who has had a long and savage journey returns home to Peru; a Carpathian novel.
books.name: DARK PREDATOR

books.author: by Clive Cussler and Justin Scott
books.description: It is 1910 and the age of flying machines is still in its infancy. Detective Isaac Bell’s new adventure is taking off.
books.name: THE RACE

books.author: by J.R. Ward
books.description: As the son of a serial killer, the homicide detective Thomas DelVecchio Jr. atones for his father’s sins while fighting his own inner demons.
books.name: ENVY

books.author: by Tatiana de Rosnay
books.description: A contemporary American journalist investigates what happened to a little girl during the roundup of Jews in Paris in 1942.
books.name: SARAH’S KEY

books.author: by Linda Howard
books.description: Confronted by danger in the wild, a woman who owns a guide business and her male competitor must join forces if they are both to survive.
books.name: PREY

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: The Los Angeles detective Harry Bosch investigates the scandalous death of a narcotics officer.
books.name: THE BLACK ICE

books.author: by George R. R. Martin
books.description: After a colossal battle, the Seven Kingdoms face new threats; Book 5 of “A Song of Ice and Fire.”
books.name: A DANCE WITH DRAGONS

books.author: by George R.R. Martin
books.description: In the frozen wastes to the north of Winterfell, sinister and supernatural forces are mustering.
books.name: A GAME OF THRONES
